weekly_top_story.headline: Trump administration announces deal on GLP-1 pricing and coverage
weekly_top_story.summary: The Trump administration reached an agreement with Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly to significantly reduce the price of GLP-1 drugs for obesity and expanded CMS coverage for Medicare and Medicaid patients, addressing surging demand and high costs.

stories.headline: Medical societies urge repeal of new Anthem out-of-network policy
stories.summary: Over 90 medical societies are urging Anthem (Elevance Health) to repeal a new policy that penalizes hospitals with a 10% reimbursement cut when out-of-network physicians are used, starting January 2026.

stories.headline: CHN to House: Address Rising Health Costs, Oppose the November Spending Package
stories.summary: The Coalition on Human Needs is urging Congress to oppose the November spending package due to its failure to extend enhanced ACA premium tax credits, warning of a potential surge in uninsured Americans.

stories.headline: Consortium for State and Regional Interoperability Launches Health Data Utility Capability Model
stories.summary: The Consortium for State and Regional Interoperability released a new Health Data Utility Capability Model to standardize and scale health data sharing across providers, payers, and public health agencies.
